org.sakaiproject.authz.api

Interface SecurityAdvisor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccessServlet.SimpleSecurityAdvisor, AllowAllSecurityAdvisor, AllowAllSecurityAdvisor, AllowChildrenMapSecurityAdvisor, AllowMapSecurityAdvisor, CitationHelperAction.CitationListSecurityAdviser, HibernateMatrixManagerImpl.SimpleSecurityAdvisor, MySecurityAdvisor, PermissionsController.SimpleSecurityAdvisor, XsltFunctions.LocalSecurityAdvisor

    public interface SecurityAdvisor

    SecurityAdvisor is a stackable policy process that is given a chance to determine if a security question can be answered,over the logic of the SecurityService component. The advisors at the top of the stack are consulted first (added last).

    See Also:
    SecurityService.pushAdvisor(SecurityAdvisor), SecurityService.popAdvisor(SecurityAdvisor), SecurityService.hasAdvisors()

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  SecurityAdvisor.SecurityAdvice
      SecurityAdvice enumerates different SecurityAdvisor results.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SecurityAdvisor.SecurityAdvice isAllowed(String userId, String function, String reference)
      Can the current session user perform the requested function on the referenced Entity?

    • Method Detail

      • isAllowed

        SecurityAdvisor.SecurityAdvice isAllowed(String userId,
                                       String function,
                                       String reference)
        Can the current session user perform the requested function on the referenced Entity?
        Parameters:
        userId - The user id.
        function - The lock id string.
        reference - The resource reference string.
        Returns:
        ALLOWED or NOT_ALLOWED if the advisor can answer that the user can or cannot, or PASS if the advisor cannot answer.
